question: Which of the following Secondary Surveillance Radar (SSR) codes is used to indicate transponder malfunction?
explanation:
SSR uses the following codes:

  • 0000 – Transponder failure.

  • 2000 – Entry into airspace from an area where SSR operation is not required.

  • 7500 – Unlawful interference.

  • 7600 – Radio failure.

  • 7700 – Emergency.
subject: Radio Navigation

Respond to mode A interrogations but not to mode C.
